original_solution_mapping.L2: On Tuesday, Shawna was short of 30 - 19 = <<30-19=11>>11 situps

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 63.
    Returns: the number of situps Shawna would have to do on Wednesday to meet her goal.
    """
    # L1
    goal_situps = 30 # Shawna's workout goal is 30 situps
    monday_situps = 12 # Shawna was only able to do 12 situps
    monday_shortfall = goal_situps - monday_situps

    # L2
    tuesday_situps = 19 # she was only able to do 19 situps on Tuesday
    tuesday_shortfall = goal_situps - tuesday_situps

    # L3
    wednesday_situps_needed = goal_situps + monday_shortfall + tuesday_shortfall

    # FA
    answer = wednesday_situps_needed
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: On Monday, Shawna was short of {goal_situps} - {monday_situps} = <<{goal_situps}-{monday_situps}={monday_shortfall}>>{monday_shortfall} situps
On Tuesday, Shawna was short of {goal_situps} - {tuesday_situps} = <<{goal_situps}-{tuesday_situps}={tuesday_shortfall}>>{tuesday_shortfall} situps

On Wednesday, Shawna would have to do {goal_situps} + {monday_shortfall} + {tuesday_shortfall} = <<{goal_situps}+{monday_shortfall}+{tuesday_shortfall}={wednesday_situps_needed}>>{wednesday_situps_needed} situps
